title: fizz buff
body: Hello i am a fizz main. every snice fizz got nerf in the last patch he has been unplayable. He has poor cooldowns and when you use 2 abilities on an opponent (qw) you are better of auto attacking that is how bad his damage is early game. i am not asking for him to go back to the old nerf but at least give fizz a small buff on his q or w so it is possible not to lose lane.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=oyqAAYfb,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-10T05:47:33.630+0000)
>
> Go ad fizz

This AD Fizz is the new playstyle.

He doesn't need a buff, fact is at 6 he can insta gibb pretty much anyone, so his problem is his early power (cause every champ should have a weakness) and even that is taken away cause his E is a free escape.
